description:
With 10 million copies sold, the "Bomberman" series is the definitive party game, great for a quick battle anywhere, anytime.

Single Player: Hone your skills against CPU players.

Multiplayer: Play wirelessly with other players who have the game. (Up to 8 players.)

This game includes 10 Battle Game stages from "BOMBERMAN 2".
